p: The curing reaction rate, d α /dt = dH/dt/∆H total, versus the conversion plot is also shown in Figure 6. The value of dα/dt increased to the maximum and then decreased to 0 with the increasing of α. Although increasing the heating rate promotes the reaction process, the maximum dα/dt values of reaction rate at a corresponding conversion rate is not basically changed. All α are in the range of 0.3–0.5, which is a character of an autocatalytic reaction [ 28].
